item.title: Command abuse!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Well then add something like “character-pure = 0” to your character’s files. But you would obviously have to declare it in your client class. Basically do everything starter would do, but just make another one, or a copy.

item.title: Command abuse!
item.dc:creator: @o0_pwn3d_00 o0 pwn3d 00
item.description:
@o0_pwn3d_00 wrote:

currently in my server certain players seems it to be fun to abuse the ::pure command…
i need help on setting it to the old fashioned starters
currently i have this command…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(290000, 0); addSkillXP(14198480, 2); addSkillXP(14198480, 3); addSkillXP(14198480, 4); addSkillXP(14198480, 6); } }

can someone plz help me fix this…?
